description:
A fox impersonates a man`s wife.  Gods play a game of sumo to celebrate a change of fortune in a household. An old couple has a quiet contest that`s interrupted by a thief.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Battari-zawa no Kitsune / Iwai no Sumou / Danmari Kurabe
The Fox of Battari Stream / Celebratory Sumo / Quiet Contest
バッタリ沢のキツネ / 祝いの相撲 / だんまりくらべ
